notes: Baa Atoll, Maldives. Iconic barefoot luxury private island resort with treehouse dining and overwater villas. One of the most photographed resorts in the Maldives. Slow Life philosophy, strong sustainability narrative.

Noonu Atoll, Maldives. Extraordinary overwater villas with retractable roofs for stargazing. Water slide off deck. One of the most aspirational overwater resort experiences worldwide. Same PR team as Soneva Fushi.

contact_name: Lisa Jakobsson (Director of PR, Marketing & Events)
notes: Noonu Atoll, Maldives. Ultra-exclusive private island with PGA-standard golf course, spa by ESPA, private overwater villas with pools. Celebrity and UHNW clientele. Strong luxury positioning.
North Male Atoll, Maldives. One of the largest private islands in the Maldives with 130+ villas. Stunning beaches, water sports, multiple dining venues. Part of Kerzner International.

Fari Islands, North Male Atoll, Maldives. Design-led boutique luxury resort opened 2021. Part of the Fari Islands development alongside Ritz-Carlton and The Marina. Contemporary art focus, community village concept.

Noonu Atoll, Maldives. LVMH-owned ultra-luxury private island. 45 villas, Cheval Blanc Spa by Guerlain. Exceptional gastronomy, French art de vivre meets Maldivian paradise. Extremely aspirational for luxury influencers.

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru
notes: Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Maldives. Overwater and beach bungalows, world-class marine biology program, manta ray snorkeling. Exceptional wellness offerings. Two Four Seasons properties in Maldives share IG handle.

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Kuda Huraa
notes: North Male Atoll, Maldives. Surf destination, close to Malé, iconic dhoni transfers. Annual Surfing Champions Trophy. Marine biology program, diverse villa options. Classic Four Seasons luxury.

contact_name: Earle Adrienne Salalila Enriquez (Marketing & Communications Manager)
notes: Baa Atoll, Maldives. Stunning overwater villas, underwater wine cellar tasting, SEA restaurant (dining under the sea), observatories for stargazing. Signature snorkeling in UNESCO Biosphere Reserve. Exceptional photography opportunities.

contact_name: Marketing & Communications Manager (Cluster: Veli, Dhigu, Naladhu)
notes: South Male Atoll, Maldives. Adults-only overwater bungalows. Connected to Anantara Dhigu by boat bridge. Romantic, intimate resort. Excellent for couples and honeymoon content creators.

contact_name: Marketing & Communications Manager (Cluster: Veli, Dhigu, Naladhu)
notes: South Male Atoll, Maldives. Exclusive private island with 20 individual houses, each with private pool and butler. Ultra-premium sister property to Anantara Veli. Great for exclusive, intimate content.

North Male Atoll, Maldives. Award-winning overwater villa resort. 'No news, no shoes' philosophy. Rustic-chic design, sustainability-focused. Frequent winner of World's Best Resort awards. Strong aspirational brand.

Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Maldives. Intimate boutique luxury with 50 ocean residences. Exceptional house reef, Ba'theli fine dining, stunning photography. Known for personalized service and romance.

Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Thiladhoo, Maldives. Ultra-exclusive 26 beach and ocean houses, Hanifaru Bay manta rays nearby. Condé Nast Traveler Best Resort Indian Ocean. Personalized 'no menu, no schedule' approach.

contact_name: Maria Sadipun (Assistant Director of Marketing & Communications)
notes: Baa Atoll, Maldives. Family and couples-friendly luxury resort opened 2017. Exceptional coral reef, 113 villas, multiple dining outlets. PR representative Nadia Walford PR London (nadia@nadiawalfordpr.com).

Raa Atoll, Maldives. World's first immersive wellbeing island. Neuro-aesthetic design, longevity programs, ice bathing, forest bathing. Unique wellness positioning distinct from regular resort. Sister property to JOALI Maldives.

Dhaalu Atoll, Maldives. Two islands: Play and Chill. World's first underwater nightclub (Subsix), treetop dining, surf spot. Part of Minor Hotels. Vibrant, active luxury positioning. Great for lifestyle content.
Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Maldives. Laidback luxury, treehouses and overwater bungalows, wellness and surf. Family-friendly with Amilla Kids Club. Casually opulent positioning.

Lhaviyani Atoll, Maldives. 100% solar-powered, all-inclusive private island. 15 residences, Anything Anytime Anywhere concept. Part of Crown & Champa Resorts. Sustainability story plus ultra-exclusivity. Great for eco-luxury content.

Gaafu Alifu Atoll, Maldives. Remote southern atoll, pristine house reef rated among best in Maldives. 50 villas, minimalist design, world-class diving. One of the most remote and exclusive Hyatt properties globally.

South Ari Atoll, Maldives. Vibrant, energetic resort with whale shark snorkeling nearby. Cinema on the beach, Fire & Ice restaurant, Espace de Vie spa. Youthful, fun luxury positioning. Strong social media presence.

contact_name: Sureerat Sudpairak (Corporate Director of PR, Dusit International)
notes: Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Mudhdhoo Island, Maldives. Thai hospitality meets Maldivian luxury. 100 villas, unique Thai-Maldivian cultural fusion, Blue Moon dining. Great for cultural and wellness content.

North Ari Atoll, Fesdu Island, Maldives. Boldly designed, energetic luxury resort. W Hotels style with Maldivian ocean backdrop. Vibrant nightlife, AWAY Spa, water sports. Great for fashion and lifestyle influencers.

Fari Islands, North Male Atoll, Maldives. Part of the ambitious Fari Islands development. 100 villas, The Ritz-Carlton Club, extensive dining village with 7 outlets. Opened 2021, rapidly gaining prestige.

contact_name: Maria Mariska (Associate Director of Marketing & PR)
notes: Raa Atoll, Maldives. Hyatt's Alila brand in the Maldives. 80 villas, pristine UNESCO biosphere waters, contemporary design. Surf breaks accessible, wellness-focused. Newer property opening 2023.

Lhaviyani Atoll, Maldives. Three private islands, wellness-led luxury. Rebranded to Six Senses 2022. Private surf breaks, Six Senses Spa, integrated wellness programs. Covers both Laamu and Kanuhura in the portfolio.

Lhaviyani Atoll, Maldives. Newest Crown & Champa property opened October 2023. 290 villas across two islands connected by 700m bridge. Family-focused 5-star luxury. Fresh, modern resort with influencer-friendly spaces.

contact_name: Tina Dotzauer (Cluster Manager Marketing & PR, Coco Collection)
notes: North Male Atoll, Maldives. Romantic boutique luxury island, 100 private villas, exceptional house reef, barefoot elegance. Coco Collection's flagship. Strong visual identity, great for intimate couple content.

contact_name: Tina Dotzauer (Cluster Manager Marketing & PR, Coco Collection)
notes: Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, Maldives. Authentically Maldivian luxury, exceptional snorkeling, manta ray season. Adjacent to UNESCO world biosphere. Same PR manager as Coco Bodu Hithi.

Lhaviyani Atoll, Maldives. Adults-only boutique resort, dedicated influencer application program. 65 water and beach villas. Award-winning adults-only tropical hideaway. Actively seeks creator partnerships.
Ari Atoll, Maldives. Platinum all-inclusive plan, overwater and beach bungalows. Active dedicated influencer application portal. Family-friendly tropical luxury, whale shark snorkeling nearby.

brand_name: North Island, A Luxury Collection Resort
notes: North Island, Seychelles. 11 villas on a private island, conservation-focused ultra-luxury. Honeymooned by Barack and Michelle Obama, Prince William and Kate. Marriott Luxury Collection. Extraordinary ecological story and visual aesthetic.

Félicité Island, Seychelles. Private island with 30 villas and residences. Granite boulders, lush jungle, world-class diving. Six Senses wellness programming in pristine Seychelles setting. Spectacular visual backdrop.

contact_name: Clare Bromilow (Senior Director of PR & Communications)
notes: Petite Anse, Mahé, Seychelles. Hillside villas and overwater bungalows. Stunning Indian Ocean views, world-class spa, exceptional diving. Dramatic granite landscape unique to Seychelles.

Praslin Island, Seychelles. 86 villas on 30 hectares in UNESCO area. First Raffles resort, all-villa retreat. Vallée de Mai UNESCO site nearby. Exceptional gastronomy, Raffles Spa. High-end aspirational brand.

Fregate Island, Seychelles. 16-villa ultra-exclusive private island, conservation sanctuary. 2,000+ giant tortoises, rare birds. Reopening 2026 after renovation. One of the world's most exclusive private island experiences.

Saint-Gilles-les-Bains, Réunion Island. Only 5-star hotel on Réunion Island. Beachfront luxury on a volcanic island unique in the Indian Ocean. Dramatic landscape contrast of beaches, volcano, and lush interior. Very unique influencer destination.

Thaa Atoll, Maldives. Surf-focused COMO resort, authentic Maldivian experience away from tourist crowds. COMO Shambhala wellness, exceptional diving and surfing. Remote and authentic feel distinct from North Male Atoll resorts.
